author: kbennett@times-news.com(Kyle Bennett)
title: #CTNFootballFriday 10-16-15
text:
#CTNFootballFriday 10-16-15 kbennett@times-news.com The Cumberland Times-News Posted on Oct 16, 2015 
Welcome to #CTNFootballFriday - Our weekly installment that brings you live coverage of high school football action every Friday night. 
Tonight's games include: 
South Hagerstown (4-2) at Fort Hill (4-1), 7 p.m.; Northern (4-2) at Mountain Ridge (4-1), 7 p.m.; Robert C. Byrd (4-2) at Keyser (5-2), 7 p.m.; Frankfort (2-5) at Petersburg (4-3), 7 p.m.; Moorefield (6-0) at East Hardy (5-1), 7:30 p.m.; Pendleton (5-2) at Southern (1-4), 7 p.m.; and Musselman (4-3) at Hampshire (1-5), 7 p.m. 
Allegany (5-1) will host Capitol Christian Academy (0-5) tomorrow, 5 p.m. 
Be sure to follow our sports reporters on Twitter: @MikeBurkeCTN , @MikeMathewsCTN and @ChrisAppelCTN , as well as @KyleBennettCTN . 
As we update scores on our homepage, www.times-news.com , you can interact with us in the comments section below the posting of updates and scores. 
Tweet us your comments, photos and videos at #CTNFootballFriday or #CTNFF . Kyle Bennett is a multiplatform journalist at Cumberland Times-News. To reach him, call/text 240-362-3737, email kbennett@times-news.com and follow him on Twitter . Sign Up / Sign In With your existing account from... {* loginWidget *}
